# {{projectName}} - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
{{description}}

## Remember
- All current state info lives in [[CLAUDE.md]]
- This file contains workflows that rarely change
- Check CLAUDE.md for stakeholders, dates, versions, status

## Session Start Checklist
1. Read [[CLAUDE.md]] for current project state
2. Check [[{{projectName}} - Implementation Log]] for recent work
3. Review [[{{projectName}} - INDEX]] for open items
4. Update CLAUDE.md with any status changes

## Critical Operating Rules
- Always use MCP tools for vault operations
- Never write files directly to vault paths
- Maintain consistent cross-linking
- Update timestamps when modifying files
- Use wikilink format for all internal links

## File Organization

### Core Files
- `CLAUDE.md` - Dynamic project state (dates, status, stakeholders)
- `PROJECT_INSTRUCTIONS.md` - Static workflows (this file)
- `{{projectName}} - INDEX.md` - Project hub with links
- `{{projectName}} - Implementation Log.md` - Daily progress log

### Directory Structure
- `Architecture/` - Technical decisions and design docs
- `Requirements/` - Feature specs and user stories
- `Implementation/` - Code samples and technical notes
- `Meetings/` - All meeting notes and decisions
- `Resources/` - External references and assets

## Version Control
- Create git checkpoints before major changes
- Use descriptive commit messages
- Reference issue numbers when applicable

## Common Tasks

### Recording a Meeting
1. Create file: `Meetings/YYYY-MM-DD {{projectName}} - [Meeting Type].md`
2. Include attendees, agenda, decisions, action items
3. Link from Implementation Log
4. Update CLAUDE.md with key decisions

### Adding a Requirement
1. Create file: `Requirements/{{projectName}} - [Feature Name].md`
2. Include user story, acceptance criteria, priority
3. Link from project INDEX
4. Update status in CLAUDE.md if high priority

### Documenting Architecture
1. Create file: `Architecture/{{projectName}} - [Component/Decision].md`
2. Use ADR format if major decision
3. Link from CLAUDE.md decisions section
4. Update INDEX with architecture summary

### Daily Progress Update
1. Add entry to Implementation Log with date header
2. Include: status, actions, decisions, blockers, next steps
3. Update CLAUDE.md if phase or status changes
4. Check off completed items in INDEX

## Workflow Patterns

### Planning Phase
- Define objectives in CLAUDE.md
- Create requirement documents
- Document initial architecture
- Identify all stakeholders

### Development Phase
- Daily updates in Implementation Log
- Regular architecture documentation
- Link implementations to requirements
- Track blockers in CLAUDE.md

### Testing Phase
- Document test plans and results
- Track issues and resolutions
- Update requirements with clarifications
- Prepare deployment documentation

## Tag Conventions
- Project tag: `project/{{projectSlug}}` (always include)
- Phase tags: `phase/planning`, `phase/development`, etc.
- Type tags: `type/meeting`, `type/requirement`, etc.
- Status tags: `status/active`, `status/blocked`, etc.

## Quality Checklist
- [ ] All files properly tagged
- [ ] Cross-links maintained
- [ ] CLAUDE.md reflects current state
- [ ] Implementation Log updated regularly
- [ ] Decisions documented with rationale
- [ ] Requirements linked to implementations
